Scenario Activity

In a world full of possibilities, where dreams intersect with determination, one individual finds herself at a crossroads, ready to embark on a unique path to fulfill her calling. Meet Dana, a resilient young woman with unwavering aspirations of becoming a paramedic. Though her dreams seemed shattered as her parents depleted her college fund to rebuild their house after it burned down, Dana is still determined to follow her dreams. As she steps into Mr. C's counseling office, armed with determination and an unwavering desire for success, she discovers a compelling alternative for her future.  Watch the video below, then select the Begin Scenario button to follow Dana on her journey to follow her dream of becoming a paramedic.
